sentence.Network_en: Ad valorem duties are levied on the basis of the product's value.
sentence.Network_cn: 从价税是以商品的价值为基础而征收的税.

sentence.Network_en: Client in succession ate a few cake, ad valorem paid cash.
sentence.Network_cn: 顾客一连吃了几个饼, 按价付了钱.

sentence.Network_en: System prepared for computer assisted for an ad valorem property tax.
sentence.Network_cn: 有计算机辅助的基于价格的房地产税收系统.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年5月4日 - 从价关税(Ad Valorem Duties),是指以商品价格为标准征收的关税从价之意,即从价关税是采用从价原则征收的,它是按价格的一定百分比征收,税额随价格的.
按价(AD VALOREM) - 智利 (Chile) 农业(AGRICULTURE) - 智利 (Chile) 争端解决 (DISPUTE SETTLEMENT) - 阿根廷 (Argentina) 争端解决 (DISPUTE SETTLEMENT) -.

list.abs: System prepared for computer assisted ad valorem property tax ., 有计算机辅助的基于价格的房地产税收系统.

ad valorem taxes ( mainly property tax and sales taxes ) are a major source of revenues for state and municipal governments , especially in jurisdictions that do not employ a personal tax .从价税（主要是不动产税和销售税)是一个主要的收入来源国家和市级政府，尤其是在管辖范围内不雇用个人所得税。
admitted asset 受保资产，承保资产ad valorem 从价征收advance 预付款，垫付款，贷款
advalorem tariff 从价关税additional allowance 额外免税额
ADS 美国存托股份Ad valorem 从价；按值Affiliated company 关联公司；联营公司
